message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and believe it would be valuable to you. I'm offering it at $12,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm only able to pay up to $9,500 for the product. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is already a competitive price. Could you meet me halfway at $10,500?
Hello Alice, I've considered your offer and am willing to go up to $10,200 for the product. Would this be acceptable?
